name: CowsAndBullsOnline(Soon)
description:
Find the hidden Numbers using the position clues. Hidden Numbers has four digits, no repeats Enter guesses, four Numbers, no repeats

Exact positional match is a BULL (Number is same position in the guess and in the hidden Numbers), like in bulls-eye 

Partial match (Number is present in the hidden Numbers but at a different position) is a COW 

For example, if the hidden Numbers is 3618,

Guess 6958 has 1 bull (8), 1 cow (6)

Guess 3712 has 2 bulls (3 & 1), 0 cow

cows Guess 3618 has 4 bulls, game over

Team Member:
